params.name: prompt_length_to_skip
params.description: The input tokens length. Not a valid argument when used with generate as it will automatically assign theinput length.

params.name: min_new_tokens
params.description: The minimum new tokens length below which the score of eos_token_id is set to -float(Inf).

params.name: eos_token_id
params.description: The id(s) of the end-of-sequence token.

params.name: device
params.description: The device to allocate the tensors.
